function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Transmission of contagious diseases through wastewater collection system","Impact":"Potential spread of diseases to population through wastewater","Mitigation":"Implementing effective disinfection processes in wastewater treatment","Technologies":"Ultraviolet (UV) disinfection, chlorination, ozonation","People":"Population, workers in the wastewater treatment plants","Owner":"Government, wastewater treatment facility operators"}]}
